Header: European Union Delegation Meets Jaffna Commander
Content: Mr Riccardo Chelleri, Policy Officer of Democracy and Election Division, European External Action Service and a delegation of the European Union paid a courtesy visit to the Security Forces Headquarters - Jaffna (SFHQ-J) during their visit to the Northern Province on Friday (9). The delegation was warmly welcomed by Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya, Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna. The discussions centred on gestures of reconciliation, confidence-building, development and security situation.
